import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import getCartAction from '../Store/Action/Get_Cart_Action' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const My_Cart = () => { const [itemAddedToCart, setitemAddedToCart] = useState() let getCartdata = useSelector(state => state.GetCartReducer?.cartItem) console.log(getCartdata) if (!localStorage.getItem("logintoken")) { getCartdata = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')) console.log(getCartdata) } const dispatch = useDispatch() const logintoken = localStorage.getItem("logintoken") useEffect(() => { console.log("gjhgjhjk") if (logintoken) { getCartAction(dispatch, {}) } }, [dispatch]) return (<> {getcartdata ? getCartdata.map((item, index) => { return (<>

1 item in your cart

) }) : null} ) } export default My_Cart
